author: Emma Powell
title: Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after 'too much black forest gateau'
text:
Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after â€˜too much black forest gateauâ€™ 
The pair tumbled down onto the sofa in fits of laughter Thursday 30 March 2017 15:05 BST Click to follow 
Ben Shephard dropped Susanna Reid as they attempted a Strictly Come Dancing lift on Good Morning Britain . 
Andi Peters challenged the pair to show off their best moves â€“ but it didnâ€™t quite go to plan. 
Putting his hands on Reidâ€™s waist, Shephard said: â€œAndi wanted to see a lift, so here you go!â€ 
Reid shrieked as she was hoisted into the air before Shephard buckled and the pair fell backwards onto the sofa. Aching: Ben Shephard holds his back in 'pain' (ITV) 
Reid â€“ whose legs flew up in the air â€“ cried: â€œOh my goodness.â€ 
Holding onto his back, Shephard joked: â€œI think Iâ€™ve put my back out.â€ 
Les Dennis, who was on the show to promote his role as Uncle Fester in a touring production of The Addams Family, said: â€œIf that was your audition for Strictly â€“ I donâ€™t think youâ€™re going to get that.â€ 
Reid later joked that Shephard couldnâ€™t keep her in the air because sheâ€™d eaten â€œtoo much black forest gateauâ€. Too much black forest gateau ğŸ˜³ https://t.co/IYhVG5L5jd â€” Susanna Reid (@susannareid100) March 30, 2017 
Viewers found the incident amusing with one referencing Shephardâ€™s game show Tipping Point: â€œYou can see why Ben presents Tipping Point. He nearly reached it.â€ 
Another suggested: â€œCould be a new round for Ninja Warrior UK.â€ 
A third tweeted: â€œPiers Morgan isn't going to be best pleased (sic).â€ Read more
